DOC.brief_summary: Background Studies United Kingdom find stratified care model STarT Back Tool ( SBT ) superior usual care primary care low back pain ( LBP ) patient . However , consideration difference health care social system across country require take step towards recommendation implement stratify care health care service . Objective To investigate effectiveness stratify care model SBT , embed regional disease management program LBP primary care compare current best practice care .
DOC.brief_title: Low Back Pain - What 's Next ? Stratified Care Compared Current Practice
DOC.detailed_description: Methods The study two-armed randomize control trial Danish primary health care set . In total 700 patient include study . The patient randomise automatically developed database ; 1 ) Stratified care ( treatment match stratification accord SBT ) 2 ) Control treatment ( treatment base solely clinical reason ) . All data include patient consent collect monitor use web-based data management system .
DOC.criteria: patient find eligible referral physiotherapy general practitioner ( GP ) 18 year understand Danish language . Serious pathology ( malignancy , inflammatory arthritis , etc . ) , serious nerve root compression ( cauda equina , paresis < 3 ) , influential comorbidity , psychiatric illness , personality disorder , spinal surgery last 6 month , pregnancy , already receive physiotherapy treatment .
